meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0.Beta1 released!
meta.summary: The first beta of the upcoming Vert.x 4.1 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.7 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.7 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.
